resources.string: Open the "Chose service" and add necessary services!
You have not got a contracts!
To make a contract you need to make an order!

A local area network is a computer network that usually covers a relatively small area or a small group of buildings. (house, office, firm, institute). All modern local networks are divided into two types: Peer-to-peer local networks are networks where all computers are equal: each of the computers can be both a server and a client. The user of each of the computers decides for himself what resources will be shared and to whom. Local networks with centralized management. In networks with centralized control, the security policy is common to all network users. Depending on the purpose and size of the local network, either peer-to-peer networks or networks with centralized control are used.
Our program was created for convenient work with our clients. You can choose the necessary services, place an order, and then it is up to us.
